SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Shipment Item Fields

The Shipment Item object represents a product included in a shipment. It’s associated with one fulfillment order product.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Shipment Item object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Created By	The user who created the shipment item record.
Created Date	The date that the shipment item record was created.
Description	The description of the shipment item.
Expected Delivery Date	The expected delivery date for the shipment that contains the shipment item.
Fulfillment Order Product	The fulfillment order product associated with the shipment item.
Last Modified By	The user who last changed the shipment item record.
Last Modified Date	The date that the shipment item record was last changed.
Order Product Summary	The order product summary associated with shipment item.
Product	The product represented by the shipment item.
Quantity	The quantity of products represented by the shipment item.
Return Order Line Item	For a return shipment item, the associated return order item.
Shipment	The shipment that contains the shipment item.
Shipment Item Number	The unique identification number for the shipment item.
Tracking Number	The tracking number for the shipment that contains the shipment item.
Tracking URL	The tracking URL for the shipment that contains the shipment item.
SEE ALSO

title: Shipment Item Object in Salesforce Order Management
